column4: is it just me,   is the reason i can't get updates for 8.04(testing my transparent approx setup) because 9.04 released?
probably the mirrors are getting hammerd atm
kk..   i have a friend beside me, using what is normally a blazing mirror, 150k/s at this location,  crawling @ 35-40k/s :)
on day's like today connects on the mirrors are like lemmings jumping off a cliff
